title: Differential Calculus
description: Differential calculus including applications and the underlying theory of limits for functions and sequences. Credit not awarded for both MATH 1551 and MATH 1501, MATH 1503, or MATH 1550.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 1113 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 11X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) or SAT Mathematics 600 or MATH SECTION SCORE 620 or Converted ACT Math 600 or ACT Math 26
